document.full_text: suspected drug hitmen dumped six headless bodies outside a school in northern mexico monday a day after forensics pulled victims out of a nearby mass grave in a stream of unrelenting violence that is pressuring mexican president felipe calderon.
document.title: gunmen dump beheaded bodies outside school in mexico
lines_and_colors: suspected drug hitmen dumped six headless bodies outside a school in northern mexico monday a day after forensics pulled victims out of a nearby mass grave in a stream of unrelenting violence that is pressuring mexican president felipe calderon.
